title: Zomato completes acquisition of Paytm’s entertainment ticketing biz
description: During a transition period (up to 12 months), the movie and event tickets will continue to be available on the Paytm app, as well as on the TicketNew and Insider platforms, ensuring a smooth and uninterrupted experience for users and merchant partners.
content: Food delivery major Zomato has completed the acquisition of Paytm’s event ticketing subsidiaries Wasteland Entertainment Private Limited (WEPL) and Orbgen Technologies Private Limited (OTPL), the company said in an exchange filing. OTPL and WEPL operate the TicketNew and Insider platforms, respectively.ET first reported on June 16 that Paytm was in talks to sell Paytm Insider to Deepinder Goyal’s Zomato, which is looking to expand the “going-out” business.In a separate filing, Noida-based Paytm also confirmed that the transfer of the events and movies ticketing business to Zomato was completed on August 27.The deal was valued at Rs 2,048 crore, both companies had said on August 21.During a transition period (up to 12 months), the movie and event tickets will continue to be available on the Paytm app, as well as on the TicketNew and Insider platforms, ensuring a smooth and uninterrupted experience for users and merchant partners.
